name: SPLASH OUT!
description:
"SPLASH OUT!" is a high-speed action game where your survival is at stake.
Travel through an unknown world to reach a goal filled with warm light!



  • GAME SYSTEM
    Proceed to the lighted goal at the back while avoiding obstacles.

    Acquiring energy along the way will restore your strength, which gradually decreases,
    Obtaining boosts increases the speed of the aircraft.

    There are also BOMBS that clear out obstacles and boosts that greatly increase speed.



  • CUSTOM
    Points earned during play can be used to strengthen and acquire new aircraft.

  • ONLINE LEADERBOARD
    The goal is to reach the goal as quickly as possible, and the clear time can be competed with players from around the world.



The controls are intuitive and easy to understand, and this simple game allows you to enjoy a sense of speed and exhilarating floating.
Show us your best score in Time Attack!
